title: PCI App 12+
subtitle: PCI: opening coronary arteries
appDescription: An algorithmic, step-by-step approach to percutaneous coronary interventions. Browse parts, chapters, and chapter sections. Watch cases and listen to podcasts.

reviews.title: Excellent resource
reviews.review: This app is an excellent initiative towards helping interventional cardiologist in decision making during procedures. I have briefly reviewed some topics; and found it very helpful. But the initiative and concept itself for such apps is commendable more
